text: @StephenKing Yea ain't THAT some dumb SHIT!! The man is INSANE!! He wants to defund covid-19 tests but sign an executive order to PROTECT SOME STUPID ASS statues of HATE!! Where's the SENSE to THAT??? 🤔🤔
